title: Experts Available to Discuss COVID-19 Pandemic as Federal Public Health Emergency Declaration Ends
descriptions: Experts from the nonprofit RAND Corporation are available to discuss issues related to the COVID-19 pandemic as the federal government's public health emergency declaration is scheduled to end on May 11. RAND has done substantial research about the pandemic.

image.desc: A stack of white FFP2 or N95 respirator face masks on a cyan background, photo by Christian Horz/Getty Images

sub_content.Interviews:
To arrange an interview, contact the RAND Office of Media Relations:
(703) 414-4795 or
(310) 451-6913, or
send an email to media@rand.org.

content.Article: May 5, 2023 Experts from the nonprofit RAND Corporation are available to discuss issues related to the COVID-19 pandemic as the federal government's public health emergency declaration is scheduled to end on May 11. RAND has done substantial research about the pandemic.
